identity.mission: Create a top 1% University Admin Portal that blends Swiss precision with Institutional Authority.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Fintech Dashboard' density with 'University Campus' warmth.
Emotion First: Admin work is stressful; the UI must be calming and predictable.
Content is King: The 'Days Remaining' metric is the hero. Everything else supports it.
Zoom In: Focus on the specific clause details (Clause 57 vs 62) in the UI.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to separate 'Request' actions from 'History' logs.

usage.headings: Use Manrope for all page titles and card headers. Letter spacing -0.02em.
usage.body: Use Inter for all data tables, forms, and paragraphs.
usage.numbers: Use tabular-nums class for all data grids and vacation day counters.

usage_rules: Use Royal Blue (#1e40af) for Primary Buttons, Active Navigation, and Key Metrics.
Use Academic Red (#b91c1c) sparingly for 'Reject' actions, 'Urgent' alerts, and 'Clause 62' badges.
NEVER use gradients for the main background. Keep it clean #f8fafc.
Use 'Ice Blue' (#eff6ff) for active row highlighting in tables.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for card padding. Gap-6 for grids.

grid_strategies.admin_dashboard: Control Room Grid: 4-column layout. Stats on top, dense data tables below.
grid_strategies.teacher_dashboard: Tetris Grid: Asymmetric layout. 'Days Remaining' is the Hero (col-span-2). Calendar is secondary.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-foreground border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2
buttons.destructive: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2

cards.style: Clean, white background, 1px border (slate-200), subtle shadow-sm. No heavy drop shadows.

inputs.style: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use strictly for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click. Hover states on table rows.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

login_hero.usage: Split screen login page. Left side image, Right side form.

teacher_avatar.usage: Default avatar for teacher profile demo.

business_logic_visuals: CRITICAL: Display 'Clause 57' and 'Clause 62' explicitly on the dashboard.
Clause 57 (Vacations): Show TWO progress bars (Period 1 & Period 2).
Clause 62 (Economic Days): Show a counter 'X/8 Days Used'.
Tenure Bonus: Highlight 'Extra Days' gained from seniority with a gold/yellow icon or text.
Contract Types: Visually distinguish 'Full Time' vs 'Part Time' vs 'Hourly' in the Admin User List using badges.

pages.login: Split layout. Left: Hero Image with Royal Blue overlay. Right: Clean form.
pages.admin_dashboard: Top: 4 Stats Cards (Total Teachers, Pending Requests, Active Permits, Today's Absences). Middle: 'Recent Requests' Table. Right: Mini Calendar.
pages.teacher_dashboard: Hero: 'Welcome back, [Name]'. Big Stats: 'Days Remaining'. Action: 'Request Permit' button (Primary). Bottom: 'My History' list.
pages.calendar: FullCalendar or similar. Color code events: Blue = Vacation, Red = Economic Permit.

tech_constraints: Use 'recharts' for Admin Analytics (e.g., Peak Vacation Months).

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid.
